Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor

Class ScoreCalculatorVisitor

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor.ScoreCalculatorVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoardVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScoreCalculatorWithBonusVisitor
public class ScoreCalculatorVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoardVisitor
Represent one of the different variants to calculate the score for the game. This one is the normal version (based on the official rules) It implements IBoard Visitor to follow the visitor's construction.

    • colorListOfOneRow

      private java.util.ArrayList<Card.Color> colorListOfOneRow​(java.util.Map<Coordinates,​Card> map, int nb_Box, Coordinates nextCard, boolean isARow)
      This method build a color List from Cards of a row or a column of the board.
      Parameters:
      map - , the placed Cards' map with their coordinates
      nb_Box - , the number of boxes to browse
      nextCard - , coordinates of the first Card to put in the list
      isARow - , if the list is a Row list or a Column list
      Returns:
      a color List which match the cards of the row/column.

    • calculateScoreOfColorRow

      private int calculateScoreOfColorRow​(java.util.ArrayList<Card.Color> list, int MAX, Card.Color color)
      This method calculate the score from a color list by comparing each color with the victory card's color
      Parameters:
      list - , the color list to browse
      MAX - , the number of values to compare
      color - , the color of the victory card
      Returns:
      the score of the color list

    • calculateColorScoreAlignment

      protected int calculateColorScoreAlignment​(int nb_victory_color)
      This method calculate the score according to the number of the alignment's length (cf. statement's table score)
      Parameters:
      nb_victory_color - , the number of colors which following each other.
      Returns:
      the score of the current alignment
